features: COLLECTIBLE FIGURES AND ROLEPLAY TOYS: Fans, collectors, and kids alike can enjoy these collectible figures and roleplay toys, inspired by characters from the Marvel Universe.
MARVEL COMICS-INSPIRED DESIGN: Toys feature design and detail based on the Marvel Universe and are great for display in a Marvel collection.

LOOK FOR OTHER MARVEL TOYS: Be on the lookout for other figures and gear to imagine brave heroes defending the world from evil villains! Additional products each sold separately. Subject to availability.
body.description: With over 80 years of comic book history, Marvel has become a cornerstone of fan collections around the world. From figures to vehicles to roleplay toys, Marvel toys offer character-inspired products for every type of fan, from adult collectors to kids. Imagine adventures with characters like Iron Man, Captain America, Spider-Man, Black Panther, and more! With Marvel figures and roleplay toys, fans can re-enact battles with their favorite heroes and play their part in saving the galaxy! Additional figures and roleplay toys each sold separately. Subject to availability. Copyright 2019 MARVEL. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Experience Marvel Legends! For 20 years, the Marvel Legends series has brought the iconic characters and stories of Marvel to life for fans and collectors around the world with premium action figures drawn from across the Marvel Entertainment multiverse. Bring the excitement and wonder of the Marvel Universe to your collection with figures from the Marvel Legends Series!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The articulation is not the best ever but once you get him into the pose you want it looks amazing and with some manipulating stands very sound on its own

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Marvel Hasbro Legends Series Iron Man Mark 46 - A Masterpiece from Civil War!
reviews.reviewText: I recently added the Marvel Hasbro Legends Series Iron Man Mark 46 from Captain America: Civil War to my collection, and I'm beyond impressed with the exceptional craftsmanship and attention to detail that went into this figure.The first thing that caught my eye was the stunning accuracy in capturing the sleek and iconic design of the Mark 46 armor. The sculpt is meticulous, highlighting the intricate details of the suit seen in the movie. The metallic paintwork adds a realistic sheen, making this figure a true standout in any display. The inclusion of arc reactor and repulsor effects further enhances the overall visual appeal.Articulation is a major strength of this Iron Man figure. The joints are well-engineered, providing an extensive range of motion that allows for dynamic and action-oriented poses. Whether you want to recreate Iron Man's airborne maneuvers or iconic battle stances, this figure delivers on the promise of versatility.The accessories provided are a delightful addition. The figure comes with interchangeable hands, allowing for various hand poses and repulsor blasts. The inclusion of flight stand compatibility adds an extra layer of display options, allowing collectors to showcase Iron Man in mid-flight poses.The packaging is collector-friendly, featuring character-specific artwork and a window display that allows enthusiasts to appreciate the figure without compromising its condition. The box also includes information about other figures in the series, encouraging collectors to explore more from the Marvel Legends lineup.While the price point may be on the higher side, the Marvel Hasbro Legends Series Iron Man Mark 46 justifies its cost with its exceptional quality and the level of detail that went into recreating this iconic armor from Captain America: Civil War.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great, one issue
reviews.reviewText: It is a nice looking figure, only real issue is not much articulation in the arms so you can’t do too much with it. Still a solid figure.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for collectors
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for stop motion and collection. However it isn’t easy to move around.

Muy buena figura, llegó en buen estado, el rostro de Robert Downey Jr está muy bien hecho, la articulación es limitada pero eso no es problema si lo quieres poner en posición de vuelo, para colección está perfecta y más por el precio.
I like the Color it's very accurate and the sculpture was amazing
